DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare DAILIES TOTAL1速 ( DT1 ) 1-DAY ACUVUE速 TruEye速 ( TE ) Investigator-rated successful lens centration Japanese population .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation DAILIES TOTAL 1速 Performance Japanese Population
DOC.criteria: Must sign inform consent form ; Habitual current daily disposable soft contact lenses wearer ; Symptoms contact lens discomfort define Symptomatology ( Eligibility ) Questionnaire Lenses within power range specify protocol ; Vision correctable 20/25 0.1 logMAR ( logarithmic minimum angle resolution ) good eye distance prestudy contact lenses Visit1 ; Acceptable lens fit study contact lenses ; Willing wear lens every day least minimum 10 day , 6 hour per day , every day possible attend study visit ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Currently wear DT1 TE sphere lens ; Ocular anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality , active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear ; Use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined investigator ; Eye injury surgery within 12 week immediately prior enrollment ; History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery irregular cornea ; Prior refractive surgery ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens ; Participation clinical trial within 30 day enrollment visit ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
